SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AppDriver
The AppDriver class serves as the main entry point of the Shape Sorting Program.
BaseAreaCompare
The BaseAreaCompare class implements the Comparator interface and provides a comparison rule for sorting Shape objects based on their base area.
Cone
The Cone class represents a three-dimensional geometric shape that extends the abstract Shape class.
Cylinder
The Cylinder class models a 3D shape with two parallel circular bases connected by a curved surface.
FileHandler
The FileHandler class is responsible for reading and parsing text files containing shape data, and creating corresponding Shape objects based on that data.
OctagonalPrism
The OctagonalPrism class represents a prism with an octagonal base.
PentagonalPrism
The PentagonalPrism class models a prism with a pentagonal base.
Prism
The Prism class serves as an abstract base for all prism-like shapes.
Program
The Program class is responsible for interpreting and validating the command-line arguments passed into the program.
Pyramid
The Pyramid class represents a square-based pyramid, a 3D shape with a square base and four triangular faces converging to a single apex.
Shape
The Shape class is an abstract base class that defines a generic 3D shape characterized by its height.
ShapeComparator
The ShapeComparator class is a flexible comparator that allows Shape objects to be compared based on one of three selectable attributes: - Height ("h") - Base Area ("a") - Volume ("v") This comparator is used dynamically depending on user input, allowing the same sorting logic to be reused for multiple metrics.
Sorter<T>
The Sorter class provides multiple sorting algorithms to order Shape objects.
SquarePrism
The SquarePrism class represents a three-dimensional prism with a square base.
TriangularPrism
The TriangularPrism class models a prism with an equilateral triangular base.
VolumeCompare
The VolumeCompare class implements the Comparator interface to sort Shape objects based on their volume.
